name: 林靜娟
objective:
本課程從社會、藝術、環境、哲學思想與文化等角度剖析二十世紀後地景建築所呈現的各種面向。課程含蓋：一、當代地景建築的前身、萌芽與趨勢。二、當代主要思潮與地景建築的詮釋。三、當代地景建築師和作品之批評與研討。
This course pinpoints on various aspects of landscape architecture from the 20th century onwards. Social, artistic, environmental, philosophical, and cultural viewpoints involved along the flow of contemporary landscape architecture are to be included. Contents consists of:   1 The germs, predecessors and trends of contemporary landscape architecture.   2 Contemporary interpret on landscape architecture.   3 Critics and Seminars on landscape architects and works of contemporary significance.
